categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The "Queen of Vipers" was a masked criminal who was active in the Anoat sector at the time of the Galactic Empire's Iron Blockade. Because she targeted wealthy Imperial businessbeings, she ranked among the Empire's most wanted criminals—even though her heists never resulted in a single death. Publicly disavowed and privately adored, the Queen of Vipers was a hero to every young member of the Noble Court who felt that talking was not enough.
During the blockade, the Queen joined the crew of a young smuggler, assisting them on various missions.
